title: Understanding Schizoaffective Disorder
text: Schizoaffective disorder is a complex mental health condition that involves symptoms of both schizophrenia and mood disorders. It is important to understand the components that make up this disorder.

title: Components of Schizoaffective Disorder
text: Consider the symptoms of schizophrenia, such as hallucinations or delusions, and how they might coexist with mood disorders like depression or bipolar disorder.

hintAnswer: major depressive disorder, manic episode, bipolar disorder
title: Identifying Mood Disorders
text: What are some examples of mood disorders that can be present in schizoaffective disorder?

title: Symptoms of Schizophrenia
text: What are some common symptoms of schizophrenia that might be present in schizoaffective disorder?

title: Combining Symptoms
text: Schizoaffective disorder involves a combination of symptoms from both schizophrenia and mood disorders. Think about how these symptoms might interact.
